(2007) | This album = ''Best Of RBD''

(2008) | Misc = }} '''''Best of RBD''''' is the second compilation album by the Mexican pop group RBD, released in September 2008 in Mexico and on October 2008 on South America and United States. The album compiles all of the singles included in the group's first five studio albums, ''[[Rebelde (album)|Rebelde]]'' (2004), ''[[Nuestro Amor]]'' (2005), ''[[Celestial (RBD album)|Celestial]]'' (2006), ''[[Rebels (album)|Rebels]]'' (2006) and ''[[Empezar desde Cero]]'' (2007), plus a studio version from "[[No Pares]]", a track released on their ''[[Live In Hollywood (RBD album)|Live In Hollywood]]'' album (2006). The Album was certified Golden in Serbia and Ecuador. The only singles not included on the album are "[[MÃ©xico, MÃ©xico]]", "[[Dame (song)|Dame]]", "[[Wanna Play]]", "[[Money Money]]" and "[[Y No Puedo Olvidarte]]". ==Best Of RBD== ===Track listings=== ;CD #"[[Rebelde (song)|Rebelde]]" (DJ Kafka,Carlos Lara billed as ''DJ Kafka'' Max Di Carlo) â 3:32 #"[[Solo quÃ©date en silencio|SÃ³lo QuÃ©date en Silencio]]" (Mauricio Arriaga) â 3:37 #"[[Un poco de tu amor|Un Poco de tu Amor]]" (DJ Kafka, Max Di Carlo) â 3:24 #"[[SÃ¡lvame]]" (DJ Kafka, Max Di Carlo, Pedro DamiÃ¡n) â 3:43 #"[[No Pares]]" (Studio version) ([[Lynda Thomas|Lynda]], Carlos Lara) â 3:47 #"[[Nuestro amor|Nuestro Amor]]" (Memo MÃ©ndez Guiu, Emil "Billy" MÃ©ndez) â 3:34 #"[[AÃºn hay algo|AÃºn Hay Algo]]" (Carlos Lara, Karen SokoloffMax Di Carlo billed as ''Karen Sokoloff'') â 3:33 #"[[Este corazÃ³n|Este CorazÃ³n]]" (Armando Ãvila) â 3:30 #"[[Tras de mÃ­|Tras De MÃ­]]" (Carlos Lara, Karen Sokoloff, Pedro DamiÃ¡n) â 3:11 #"[[Tu Amor]]" ([[Diane Warren]]) â 4:38 #"[[Ser o Parecer]]" (Armando Ãvila) â 3:33 #"[[Celestial (song)|Celestial]]" (Carlos Lara, Pedro DamiÃ¡n) â 3:27 #"[[BÃ©same Sin Miedo]] (Kiss Me Like You Mean It)" ([[Chico Bennett]], John Ingoldsby) â 3:33 #"[[Inalcanzable (song)|Inalcanzable]]" (Carlos Lara) â 4:14 #"[[Empezar Desde Cero (song)|Empezar desde Cero]]" (Ãvila) â 3:14 ===Best Of RBD: (Incluye todos los videos de RBD)=== {{Infobox album | Name = Best Of RBD | Cover = | Type = greatest | Artist = RBD | Released = September 23, 2008 | Length = | Label = EMI | Last album = ''[[Hecho En EspaÃ±a (DVD)|Hecho En EspaÃ±a]]''
(2007) | This album = ''Best Of RBD''

(2008) | Misc = | Lower caption = }} The regular version released by EMI includes a DVD with the group's music videos. In Brazil, the DVD was released separately. The DVD "Best Of RBD" is a version of the CD "Best Of RBD," which contains all the video clips that the group produced during their four years of career. The DVD does not contain the latest video clip of the group, entitled, "Para Olvidarte De MÃ­", which was launched a few months after the launch of the DVD. #"[[Rebelde (song)|Rebelde]]" #"[[Solo quÃ©date en silencio|SÃ³lo QuÃ©date en Silencio]]" #"[[SÃ¡lvame]]" #"[[No Pares]]" (Live video) #"[[Nuestro amor|Nuestro Amor]]" #"[[AÃºn hay algo|AÃºn Hay Algo]]" #"[[Tu Amor]]" #"[[Ser o Parecer]]" #"[[Celestial (song)|Celestial]]" #"[[BÃ©same Sin Miedo]]" #"[[Inalcanzable (song)|Inalcanzable]]" #"[[Empezar Desde Cero (song)|Empezar desde Cero]] ==Release history== {| class="wikitable" ! End a Portuguese version, ''Hits em PortuguÃªs'' is set for an October 22, 2008 release.http://www.livrariasaraiva.com.br/produto/produto.dll/detalhe?pro_id=2605723&ID=C94FDED97D80A0F0B19380183&PAC_ID=18659 {{Dead link|date=August 2011}} The album does not feature any new tracks, therefore there won't be any official singles taken from it. ;Track listing #Salva-me (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Ser ou Parecer (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Celestial (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Beija-me Sem Medo (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Rebelde (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Esse CoraÃ§Ã£o (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Ao seu Lado (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Ensina-me (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Nosso Amor (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Fique em SilÃªncio (Version by Claudio Rabello) #O que HÃ¡ Por TrÃ¡s (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Talvez Depois (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Querer-te (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Um Pouco Desse Amor (Version by Claudio Rabello) #Venha de Novo o Amor (Version by Claudio Rabello) ==Greatest Hits== {{Infobox album | Name = Greatest Hits | Cover = | Type = greatest | Artist = RBD | Released = November 25, 2008 | Length = | Label = EMI | Misc = | Lower caption = | Reviews = | Last album = ''[[Best Of (RBD album)#Hits Em PortuguÃªs|Hits Em PortuguÃªs]]''

(2008) | Next album = ''[[Para Olvidarte De MÃ­]]''
(2009) | Misc = }} [[RBD]] introduced the CD Greatest Hits on November 25, 2008. Greatest Hits is a look at the major successes at the national level and international pop sensation of this band the world, with original content for the public especially the United States, as the bonus track "Be good" among others. The CD includes 11 of their greatest successes, a bonus track, a theme for Karaoke and a historical photo gallery. ===Track listing=== ;CD #[[Rebelde (song)|Rebelde]] #[[Solo QuÃ©date en Silencio|SÃ³lo QuÃ©date en Silencio]] #[[SÃ¡lvame]] #[[Nuestro amor|Nuestro Amor]] #[[Aun Hay Algo]] #[[Este CorazÃ³n]] #[[Tu Amor]] #[[Ser o Parecer]] #[[Celestial (song)|Celestial]] #[[Inalcanzable (song)|Inalcanzable]] #[[Empezar Desde Cero (song)|Empezar desde Cero]] Bonus Multimedia #Estar Bien (Bonus Track) #Karaoke [[Empezar Desde Cero (song)|Empezar desde Cero]] #Historical 20 Photo Gallery. ===Greatest Hits (video clips)=== {{Infobox album | Name = Greatest Hits | Cover = | Type = greatest | Artist = RBD | Released = November 25, 2008 | Length = | Label = EMI | Last album = ''[[Best Of (RBD album)#Best Of RBD: (Incluye todos los videos de RBD)|Best Of RBD]]''
